General.Name: Orge Enerji Elektrik Taahhut AS
General.Description: Orge Enerji Elektrik Taahhüt Anonim Sirketi provides electricity contracting services in Turkey. It offers electrical contracting services for weak current systems, LV electrical contract works, and MV electrical contract works, as well as construction services. The company was formerly known as ORGE Enerji Sistemleri Insaat Metal Ticaret ve Taahhüt A.S. and changed its name to Orge Enerji Elektrik Taahhüt Anonim Sirketi in June 2010. Orge Enerji Elektrik Taahhüt Anonim Sirketi was founded in 1965 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Kozyatagi Mahallesi Degirmen Sokak, Istanbul, Turkey, 34742

1.Name: Ms. Nevhan  Gunduz
